shortdesc.ph: Creates a custom audio capture track.
Creates a custom audio capture track.
Creates a custom audio capture track.

p.codeblock: Future<int> createCustomAudioTrack( {required AudioTrackType trackType, required AudioTrackConfig config});
public abstract uint CreateCustomAudioTrack(AUDIO_TRACK_TYPE trackType, AudioTrackConfig config);

section.p:
To publish custom captured audio in a channel, follow these steps:
Call this method to create an audio track and obtain the audio track ID.
When calling to join a channel, set publishCustomAudioTrackId in to the audio track ID you want to publish, and set publishCustomAudioTrack to .
Call and set trackId to the audio track ID specified in step 2 to publish the corresponding custom audio source in the channel.

To publish custom captured audio in a channel, refer to the following steps:
Call this method to create an audio track and obtain the audio track ID.
When calling to join a channel, set publishCustomAudioTrackId in to the audio track ID you want to publish, and set publishCustomAudioTrack to .
Call and specify the trackId as the audio track ID specified in step 2 to publish the corresponding custom audio source in the channel.

To publish custom captured audio in a channel, follow these steps:
Call this method to create an audio track and get the audio track ID.
When calling to join a channel, set publishCustomAudioTrackId in to the audio track ID you want to publish, and set publishCustomAudioTrack to .
Call and set trackId to the audio track ID specified in step 2 to publish the corresponding custom audio source in the channel.

To publish custom captured audio in a channel, follow these steps:
Call this method to create an audio track and obtain the audio track ID.
When calling to join a channel, set publishCustomAudioTrackId in to the audio track ID you want to publish, and set publishCustomAudioTrack to .
Call and set trackId to the audio track ID specified in step 2 to publish the corresponding custom audio source in the channel.
section.note: This method must be called before joining a channel.
You need to call this method before joining a channel.
This method must be called before joining a channel.
This method must be called before joining a channel.

plentry.pd: Custom audio track type. See . If AudioTrackDirect is specified, you must set publishMicrophoneTrack in to when calling , otherwise joining the channel will fail and return error code -2.

Custom audio track type. See . If audioTrackDirect is specified, you must set publishMicrophoneTrack to in when calling ; otherwise, joining the channel will fail and return error code -2.
The type of custom audio track. See . If AUDIO_TRACK_DIRECT is specified, you must set publishMicrophoneTrack in to when calling , otherwise joining the channel will fail and return error code -2.
Configuration of the custom audio track. See .

ul.li: If the method call succeeds, returns the audio track ID as the unique identifier of the audio track.
If the method call fails, returns 0xffffffff. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
On success, returns the audio track ID as the unique identifier of the audio track.
On failure, returns 0xffffffff. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
If the method call succeeds, it returns the audio track ID as the unique identifier of the audio track.
If the method call fails, it returns 0xffffffff. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
If the method call succeeds, returns the audio track ID as the unique identifier of the audio track.
If the method call fails, returns 0xffffffff. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
